title: Adora App
description: Worked on the Adora Child and Parent App. Developed UIs and features using Flutter & Dart with localization support. Analysed & Fixed Bugs using Firebase Crashlytics.

title: Ioninks
description: Developed Garuda Exams as the only developer on the team within a span of 3 months. Started work on 3 more applications for clients.

title: Flutter Icon Browser
description: Browse, search and get the code for any icons available in Flutter across five different packages. Available in Play Store, Desktop and the web.
